title: Row Housing - means a row of houses with only front and rear open spaces except end houses which shall be with side open spaces
clause_text: Row Housing - means a row of houses with only front and rear open spaces except end houses which shall be with side open spaces.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
